intro: Hildaea tenuis, commonly known as the slender hildaea, is a species of flowering plant in the family Acanthaceae. It is native to the Caribbean region, particularly found in countries like Cuba and the Bahamas. The plant is characterized by its slender stems and small, lance-shaped leaves.
